ygData.subject: Re: training points after jewelry is maxed
ygData.msgSnippet: Well here is what I ve put so far and where I m planning to use the others: Meditation: 1 point 2H Blunt: 15 points Evocation: 10 points Jewelry Craft: 21
ygData.messageBody:
Well here is what I've put so far and where I'm planning to use the others:
Meditation: 1 point
2H Blunt: 15 points
Evocation: 10 points
Jewelry Craft: 21 points
my plans for the next levels:
Max out research at level 16 or ASAP,
put a point in each language I need,
Max out specialization at level 20 or ASAP,
15 points in dodge at level 22.
Skara
-----Original Message-----
From: Farr, Robert [mailto:robert.farr@...]
Sent: Tuesday, April 27, 1999 11:57 AM
To: 'eqenchanters@onelist.com'
Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: training points after jewelry is maxed


From: "Farr, Robert" <robert.farr@...>

I put mine into evocation. I was fizzling Chaotic Feedback WAAY too much to
make me feel comfortable using it, and it is our first spell in that
discipline and the only one until level 16 I believe...

> -----Original Message-----
> From: jcent@... [SMTP:jcent@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, April 27, 1999 1:05 PM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqenchanters] training points after jewelry is maxed
>
> From: jcent@...
>
>
> So what does every spend their training points in AFTER its maxed at 21??
>
> languages are learned easily enough, so not there....
> melee skills go up through use easily so not there....
>
> Thanks for your thoughts...
>
> Fistlebane
